description: When Johan walks trough the woods he finds a wounded man. The man is in shock after seeing the apparition of a ghost with a broken sword. Johan brings the man to a nearby castle. There he's told about the legend of the Broken Sword. Johan looks into the legend and gets himself imprisoned in a oubliette.
name: Het Gebroken Zwaard

description:
Johan and two of his countrymen are at a joust, when suddenly his friend Berthold is challenged to a duel by a young lad. He refuses the fight but friends of the young lad say they want to fight for him.

English translation of title: The Silver Eagle.
name: De Zilveren Adelaar

description:
Johan is traveling trough Norway when he's suddenly attacked by three robbers who are looking for Djorndal, the invincible sword. They tie Johan to a tree and leave him behind. Johan is freed by Brundar, the recluse. He tells Johan the way to find the sword. He is put to the test and succeeds, when he returns to claim the sword he finds out it's been stolen.

English translation of the title: The King of the Sea.

Silver cover, with full color pages released in 1995.
name: De Zeekoning

description:
Johan travels to a small Greek island called Thosas. The islanders are forced to keep the God of the volcano quiet by bringing offerings to the mysterious White Demons that live in a cave.

English translation of the title: The White Temple.

Silver cover, with full color pages released in 1995.
name: De Witte Tempel

description:
In this issue Johan seeks out King Arthur and puts his sword in his service. He rides with Lancelot to pick up Guinevere for her marriage with Arthur, but her stepfather feels threatened in his powers should Guinevere and Arthur ever marry and tries everything to stop Guinevere from reaching Camelot.

English translation of the title: King Arthur.

Silver cover, with full color pages released in 1995.
name: Koning Arthur

description:
Shortly after his marriage with Guinevere, king Arthur sends Lancelot and Johan on a quest to find the mysterious wizard called Kerwyn. A young knight called Wallewijn also joins the quest, but he's under the influence of Mordred the traitor.

English translation of the title: Kerwyn the Wizard.

Silver cover, with full color pages released in 1995.
name: Kerwyn, de Magiër

description:
Lancelot and De Rode Ridder defeated Kerwijn the Wizard and are returning to Camelot. Guinevere has given birth to a son, Parcifal. Sir Mordred is working hard, behind the scenes, to dispose of Arthur and his knights but fails when Merlin exposes Mordred.

The witch Gnora sets Mordred free and promises him a potion that will make him invincible. When Johan and Lancelot hear of his plans they follow him

English translation of the title: The Wilde Horde.

Silver cover, with full color pages released in 1984.
name: De Wilde Horde

description:
Hugon is on his way back to Arthur's court when he comes across a group of soldiers that lay claim to his horse after losing one of their own. Hugon rides on an seeks shelter for the night in the home of Lord Rowan and his Daughter Eliane.

The soldiers that he passed that afternoon also show up, Hugon has to reach Camelot, but will he succeed?

English translation of the title: Merlin's Ring.

Silver cover, with full color pages released in 1995.
name: De Ring van Merlijn

description:
Hugon the court jester feels less of a man for not being a knight and fighting the good fight along side with them. After a child finds a stone raven in the forest fear comes down over the land and it's people. Lancelot, Guinevere and Johan find a dying man in the forest. After he dies, Hugon is thought to be the killer.

Hugon escapes and tries to flea. Will Lancelot and Johan find him in time?

English translation of the title: Hugon, the Court Jester.

Silver cover, with full color pages released in 1995.
name: Hugon, de Hofnar

description:
King Arthur, Johan, Lancelot and Merlin are at the English coast when they see a ship passing by in the middle of the night. The next morning Johan goes in search of the ship and finds it run aground near the coast. He finds a rowing boat and rows to the ship where he finds two shields tied together. The boat and Johan's rowing boat sink to the bottom.

English translation of the title: The Black Banner.

Silver cover, with full color pages released in 1995.
name: De Zwarte Banier

description:
Bogard the wizard is attacked by dwarfs. Mordred saves him and they form a bond in their struggle against King Arthur. The wizard supplies Mordred with a secret weapon that paralyzes his opponents.

English translation of the title: Enid's Empire.
name: Het Rijk van Enidd

description:
Johan is checking the northern shores of England when he comes across an Irish vessel. When he questions where the ship is going he is attacked. The next day he finds the Irishmen have come on land and are looking for princess Deirdre.

English translation of the title: The Crown of Deirdre.
name: De Kroon vann Deirdre

description:
Deirdre is in Camelot when she finds out Ronjar is dead. She returns home with Lancelot and Johan only to find out someone else has taken her throne. They need to find Ronjar's scepter so Deirdre can take her rightful place.

Translated title: Ronjar's Grave
name: Het Graf van Ronjar

description:
Johan and Lancelot save a pigeon from hunters. The animal is carrying a note from the Princes of the Night saying Olberon must die.

The two friends decide to go in search of Olberon to protect him from the Princes of the Night and Hakuwa.

Translated title: The Moonrock.
name: De Maansteen

description:
King Arthur and his knights have ridden out to put an end to the Norman's pillages. They save a Persian merchant called Sagob and invite him into Camelot castle.
Merlin doesn't trust Sagob and would like to have a closer look at the ring he wears.

Translation of the title: The Swan Burrow.
name: De Zwaneburcht

description:
When Johan and Lancelot return to Camelot after hunting wild they find that Sir Hogart has arrived. The Scotsmen insists Arthur helps him get rid of his neighbor Sir Fingham. Arthur wants to send scouts first, but Sir Hogarts doesn't agree.

Guinevere takes her son to the coast and asks Johan to stand by Arthur.

Title translation: 'Mystery at Camelot'.
name: Mysterie te Camelot

description:
Johan gives King Arthur a green sarcophagus, (which is constantly referred to as the green mummy) which he's taken home with him after a trip to the Mediterranean. Merlin warns that all who open the mummy will die a horrible death. The mummy is consequently stolen from Camelot and taken aboard the ship 'The Albatros'. The ship, Johan follows and is bound, gagged and taken aboard. By the time he wakes up the ship is already miles from the shore.

Title translation: The Green Mummy
name: De Groene Mummie

description: Title Translation: Fear over Fogland.
name: Angst over Nevelland

description: Title translation: The Siege of Crowstone.
name: Het Beleg van Crowstone

description: Title translation: The Stone Statues.
name: De Stenen Beelden

description: Title translation: The Third Weapon.
name: Het Derde Wapen

description: Title translation: The Black Rose.
name: De Zwarte Roos

description: Title translation: The Wilde Hunt.
name: De Wilde Jacht

description: Title translation: The Sunken Bell.
name: De Verzonken Klok

description:
When Johan makes his rounds trough Cambor he finds the inhabitants living in fear of a mythical beast that they blame for the disappearance of several farmers. Johan fights and kills the beast but finds out later he couldn't have taken the farmers.

Title translation: Cry of distress from Cambor.
name: Noodkreet uit Cambor

description:
King Arthur has made peace with one of his neighbors without a spilling a single drop of blood and there is to be a big feast. Merlin is against the idea, seeing signs of pending trouble and presents Arthur with a protection amulet.

Title translation: The Crack in the Round Table.
name: De Barst in de Ronde Tafel

description: Title translation: The Last Dream.
name: De Laatste Droom

description: Marvel's short-lived superstar fought enemies both infamous and obscure, but it took his death to unveil the story of his life! It's demons, depowerment and drama when the Defenders discover the true secret of Omega and his mysterious charge! Plus, the death of a super-villain who, so far, is still dead! When was the last time you saw THAT? Guest-starring Spider-Man (if you look closely enough)!
name: TPB

description: Title translation: The Testament.
name: Het Testament

description:
After the death of King Arthur the land descends into chaos. Johan and Lancelot have been sent to get Parcifal so he can be crowned the new king. Parcifal, the king's son, was sent to live with peaceful people whom have never seen war. Parcifal is not accustomed to fighting and has spent his life hoarding sheep.

Title translation: Parcifal.
name: Parcifal

description: Title translation: Three Mercenaries.
name: Drie Huurlingen

description: Title translation: Thor's Hammer.
name: De Hamer van Thor

description: Title translation: The Lorelei.
name: The Lorelei

description: Title translation: The Werewolf.
name: De Weerwolf

description: Title translation: The Prophecy.
name: De Voorspelling

description: Title translation: With Mask and Sword.
name: Met Masker en Zwaard

description: Title translation: The Return.
name: De Terugkeer

description:
The rebuild of Camelot is in full swing and Johan decides to take a trip. He meets a scared farmer along the way who tells him his bull has been taken by an unknown water creature at the water mill.

Title translation: The Water Mill.
name: De Watermolen

description:
Johan feels defeated after a tragic death in De Rode Ridder #52 - De Watermolen. He decides to go back to Belgium and goes aboard a ship which sinks during a storm. Johan swims to safety on another ship and frees the slaves. Among them is a Japanese samurai called Yorimoto.

Title translation: The Samurai.
name: De Samoerai

description: Title translation: The Hermit of Ronceval.
name: De Kluizenaar van Ronceval

description: title translation: The Coral Castle.
name: De Koraalburcht

description: Title translation: The Magic Mirror.
name: De Toverspiegel

description: Title translation: The Iron Hand.
name: De Ijzeren Hand

description: Title translation: Sidarta.
name: Sidarta

description: Title translation: In the Shadow of the Thugs.
name: In de Schaduw van de Thugs

description: Title translation: The Talking Sword.
name: Het Sprekende Zwaard

description: Title translation: The Ship of the Dead.
name: Het Dodenschip

description: Title translation: The Eagles Nest.
name: Het Adelaarsnestt

description: Title translation: The Nymphwood.
name: Het Nimfenwoud

description: Long out of print, the classic six issue mini-series will soon be available again in this slick trade paperback collection! Paul Jenkins (Civil War Frontline) and Kyle Hotz (Criminal Macabre) teamed up on this unique project that takes us to a dystopian future where traditional policing has fallen to the wayside and private corporations are stepping into fill the gap. This collection includes all six issues, plus bonus material such as character designs, layout, and lots more! Join the cyborg officers of The Agency as they hunt for a serial killer in this action packed, dark humor mini-series collected for the very first time!
name: TPB

description: Title translation: The Traitor of Yarkland.
name: De Verrader van Yarkland

description: Title translation: The Labyrinth.
name: Het Labyrint

description: Title translation: The Ice Queen
name: De IJsvorstin

description: Title translation: The Rivergod
name: De Riviergod

description: Title translation: The Bodyguard.
name: De Lijfwacht

description: The 10th Anniversary of The Darkness! Collecting The Darkness volume 2 issues #7-#16 plus the one shot The Darkness: Wanted Dead this trade paperback collection delivers new tales of The Darkness from some of the industries biggest names! Following the events from The Darkness: Resurrection Jackie has to reestablish his control over the mafia and does a final face off with his Uncle Paulie. With stories by Paul Jenkins (Wolverine: Origins, Civil War) and superstar Ron Marz (Green Lantern, Witchblade) this is a must have for any collection!
name: Volume 5

description: This is the story of the not-so-glamorous life of Eddie Edison - also known as Superior Boy! 'Cool', you say! Well, not really. Eddie works two jobs: delivering pizza to pay the bills and being a sidekick to the most powerful superhero on earth - to pay the bills. What's a guy to do? Discover the answer to this burning question, and get a healthy dose of evil villains, busty women, sex-fiends and more F-bombs than you can shake a stick at! Brilliant!
name: TPB

description: Johan meets Erik, Erwin and Kurt who are all training to be knights. Johan decides to help them and travels with them to Reigershoeve. Their stay is disturbed by a gang of robbers nearby. Erwin and Erik decide to flee but return when they can't get away from the Reigershoeve. Johan kills the head of the robber gang but not before Eric and Kurt die in battle.
name: De Gouden Sporen

description:
A CHARMING AND EXPLOSIVE HEROIN!

1892. The FATHERS OF REALMS.

Such is the name of the secret society that imposes itself as the most powerful in Victorian England since the demons chose him to create a bridge between the terrestrial plan and theirs. But certain privileges are coveted, and commerce with the demons is particularly so. Lynn Redstone is the strong arm of the Fathers. She takes on missions that only she can handle given her exceptional predispositions. But she also has to fight such violent fits of rage that they threaten her health as physical as it is mental.
name: Une porte sur l'Enfer

description:
THE FUTURE MANKIND DEPENDS ON HER

After the elimination of the Cénacle, the Fathers of the Realms have free reign. During his affront with Zachary, the traitor, Lynn may have cost herself an ally and a friend. As she discovers being the Mandragore, a half- human, half-demon hybrid, she can now only count on Marcellus Gunderson to escape her destiny.
name: La Part sombre

description: Johan falls off his horse when he travels trough a swamp in a storm. He sees someone and calls out for help but the stranger runs away. The Red Knight follows and catches up with the man when a giant lizard suddenly appears. Johan kills it but the strange man has taken the opportunity and disappears again.
name: Het Veenspook

description: Johan gets beaten up and taken aboard a ship that's headed for Baghdad. After his arrival he saves the life of the local chief and is released. Johan tries to convince the chief that he should release his slaves but he's unwilling to do so, after which Johan searches and finds the Pearl of Baghdad and gives it to the chief together with some advice to let the slaves free so they can fight the Mongols. The chief still isn't convinced and Johan goes home and finds out later the city fell to the invading Mongols.
name: De Parel van Bagdad

description: Inspiration for this issue is the Japanese legend of the forty-seven ronin.
name: Het wapen van Rihei

description: Johan travels to Cambodia and helps slaves escape their owner, King Yasodo.
name: De Val van Angkor

description: Johan breaks into a farmhouse and suspects the people in it are burglars. Turns out they're caring for a wounded knight who asks Johan to find knight Rolf van Herzele. He ends up saving maiden Hilde's life and leaves for other adventures.

Johan is in Norway, where he's challenged by a Viking. He wins the fight and meets King Horak. The king dies soon after, but not before leaving his two most likely successors with a quest to find the golden apple and the horn of Horak. The one who owns both will be the next king.

English translation of the title: The Horn of Horak.

Silver cover, with full color pages released in 1994.
name: De Hoorn van Horak

description:
Johan sees a dark figure, wrapped in black cloth, as he walks trough a village. The figure flees before Johan gets to him, he finds out later it's the mysterious Fireghost.

English translation of the title: The Fireghost.

Silver cover, with full color pages released in 1994.
name: De Vuurgeest

description:
Johan saves a young boy from an attack by a sea-eagle by killing the bird. The killing of the sea-eagle has brought to life an ancient superstition, or is there more to the story?

Silver cover, with full color pages released in 1994.
name: De Galmende Kinkhoorns

description:
Our hero wakes up on a battlefield where he's been injured. He tries to leave the battlefield and is held up by a dying man who tells him he has to find Reyhold and tell him that seven will die, and ... the black she-wolf.

English translation of the title: The Black She-Wolf.

Silver cover, with full color pages released in 1994.
name: De Zwarte Wolvin

description:
Johan and Lancelot arrive at the ruins of Camelot just as Merlin, Percifal, Kendall and his daughter Yolande arrive. It's time to rebuild Camelot and knights and soldiers from all over the country pledge their sword to Percifal.

Title translation: The Excalibur
name: De Excalibur

description: Title translation: The Forbidden Mountain.
name: De Verboden Berg
